info.name: Vocab
info.summary: Collaborate on your vocab decks and learn better
info.description:
Nextcloud Vocab provides collaborative Vocab-Training in the cloud. Features include:
+ Simple creation, editing and managing your vocables and vocab-decks + Support for Markdown (and for media) in vocab-cards + Share Decks with other Nextcloud users and edit Decks together + Import from other solutions like Anki or Vocabtrainer-App + Export to other services like Anki, Vocabtrainer-App, Markdown or JSON + Scoring of your vocab cards
Future Features might include (help welcome, see github page): + App-Companion for iOS and Android (learn to go) + Different Training techniques (Pairs, Time-Based etc.), suggestions welcome! + Dashboard Widget + Configurable Scoring
info.author: Philip Maus
